title: Evidence for the endocannabinoid system as a therapeutic target in the treatment of cannabis use disorder
citation: Martin EL & McRae-Clark AL. "Evidence for the endocannabinoid system as a therapeutic target in the treatment of cannabis use disorder" Current Addiction Reports. (2020).
